channel.title: Queens on Gourmand Syndrome
channel.description: Recent content in Queens on Gourmand Syndrome

item.title: Khun Noo Thai Noodle House
item.description: The summer heat is starting to come to NYC, and it makes everyone including me feel especially groggy. This was also a lazy weekend since we’re mentally preparing for the humidity to rapidly increase. Fortunately on this day, it was not too bad. Instead of ordering for delivery, my partner wanted to travel to eat Thai somewhere. We centered on the Woodside area since we had visited before at Thailand’s Center Point. This Thai restaurant is not too far away, just 1 stop earlier on the 7 train heading towards Flushing.
